about_the_game:
"Timeless Heart VR is a narrative-focused VR roguelite action game. In it, you'll encounter the fates of various realms sealed within the cage of time and space, while discovering the essence and meaning of this space. As the second entry in the Timeless Stories series, this game further simplifies and enriches the unique sword technique system of the series. It introduces a distinctive VR gameplay mode that merges first-person and third-person perspectives for cooperative play. You will control both yourself and your companion Lycanea, exploring and advancing through four stylistically distinct realms. Choose your weapons and your companion's armor wisely, and together break through the blockades set by fate!"

Game system introduction:


  • Sword Skill System:
Players will get "Chain Claw Prosthetic Arm" to assist in melee / range attack action.
At the same time in the game players will randomly obtain a variety of special style weapons to further strengthen their own ability.


  • Chain Claw System:
Players can use the chain claw to rapidly evade attacks from enemies and grab special objects in the scene to throw/use to break the enemy's weaknesses.


  • Companion Assistance System:
Lycaena, the heroine of this game, will accompany the player in battle, and she will also gain new skills and armor as the game progresses.


  • Elemental reaction system:
This game introduces four major elemental attributes: wind, ice, flame, and thunder. Each of them will correspond to different special effects, and different elements will react with each other to produce additional cumulative effects. Building your own and your teammates' elemental attributes properly can help you defeat your enemies more efficiently.


  • Story:


"Let me guess... You're at a point where you don't remember me, right?"
"The time here is chaotic, maybe we've already met at some point in the future."
"Or perhaps we've already had some interaction in the past?"
"Welcome to the cage of time and space, lost traveler."
"Let's get along as fellow prisoners."
——Lycaena


"I am Amadeus, the guardian of this space. "
"I advise you to halt here. Cease from further destabilizing this realm."
"But alas, it has come to this point, and I suppose you won't heed my words."
——Amadeus

 
"I have been waiting for a long time, My Lord. Have you finally responded to me?"
"Ah, I see... Weren't you the deities guarding this land?"
"It seems my prayers were not devout enough."
——Aurora


"Hello, lost traveler, and this beautiful lady."
"I am Cyrus, the captain of the Imperial Knight Order. It seems like I've lost an important memory."
——Cyrus

"Please remember this no matter what."
“This is by no means a journey of despair.“
“The wills you encounter will be with you.”
“Toward the tomorrow you hope for.”
“To Recreate this 'World'.”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, Index Controller
  • Additional Notes: For VR

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
